importantArticles.headline: Edwards Lifesciences (NYSE:EW) recently announced its updated guidance, projecting second-quarter 2025 sales between $1.45 billion and $1.53 billion, alongside first-quarter results showing a rise in sales and net income compared to the previous year. importantArticles.headline: IRVINE, Calif., April 14, 2025--Edwards Lifesciences Corporation (NYSE: EW) today announced the company’s SAPIEN M3 mitral valve replacement system received CE Mark for the transcatheter treatment of patients with symptomatic (moderate-to-severe or severe) mitral regurgitation (MR) who are deemed unsuitable for surgery or transcatheter edge-to-edge (TEER) therapy.
